textBox.richText: DHS/FEMA Certified Cyber Security Training Courses offered at no cost online 10 online courses in 3 discipline-specific tracks for end-users, IT professionals and managers. http://www.teexwmdcampus.com/user_defined_content.k2?contentID=6 IEEE Guide to the Software Engineering Body of Knowledge—SWEBOK Refresh is currently under way. To contribute to this effort and more information visit: http://computer.centraldesktop.com/swebokv3review/ Three knowledge areas are currently available for public review: Software Engineering Models and Methods Software Maintenance Mathematical Foundations Three knowledge areas have completed public review: Software Construction Software Configuration Management Computing Foundations NICE cybersecurity workforce framework An effort to consistently describe cybersecurity workforce knowledge, skills and abilities. There is opportunity to review and provide feedback. http://csrc.nist.gov/nice/framework/ NIST SP 800-53 Rev. 4 DRAFT Security and Privacy Controls for Federal Information Systems and Organizations http://csrc.nist.gov/publications/PubsDrafts.html Primary changes include controls for privacy and inclusion of SCAP and related standards.
